About Us | Content Living toggle menu Home Designs View All Home Designs The Diamond Collection The Luxe Collection The Farmhouse Collection House & Land View All Packages UNDER $600k $600k ‚Äì 650k OVER $650k Display Homes Helpful Information Our Articles Your Building Journey Demolish & Build Finance Latest Offers Who we are About us Our Journey People Testimonials Contact Us (08) 9202 5225 A happy life is built on getting a lot of little things just right. We‚Äôve had 30 plus years to perfect every step you don‚Äôt see, and every detail that you do. At Content Living, our mission is simple yet profound: to craft homes that inspire and endure. Guided by a set of core values ‚Äì integrity, innovation, and client satisfaction ‚Äì we approach every project with the aim of creating not just houses, but homes that reflect the unique stories and aspirations of our clients. Like you, we‚Äôre locals, and as one of WA‚Äôs quality home builders, you‚Äôre in the best hands. About Content Living 30,000 Plus Homes Built We‚Äôve dedicated ourselves to serving the WA community with quality built homes and exceptional service. That‚Äôs why thousands of West Australians invite us in time and time again. Over 30 Plus Years of Excellence Since we first opened our doors in 1992, we have been committed to providing homes for West Australian families that will stand the test of time for generations to come. WA Made & Owned Just like you, we‚Äôre locals, and as locals, we ensure to utilize the highest-quality Australian products whenever possible, such as the custom-made timber cabinetry in your home. Building happiness for Life Like every business, our people are at the core of who we are. From the smiling face that greets you at reception, to the team behind the scenes working hard in the office, and the hundreds of local contractors employed by us who build your new home, brick by brick. We‚Äôre with you through every step of your home building journey; from your very first meeting, right up to receiving your keys. We take pride in making your experience enjoyable and stress-free and are committed to building a home that you‚Äôre sure to love for years to come. Quality Workmanship for your peace of mind. You can rely on us to provide a quality home with exceptional service and attention to detail, every time. We review our process three times a year so we can get a clear picture of where we can improve our efficiencies and our business. We are constantly improving our building methods and our commitment to exceptional service, meaning you can rest easy knowing you‚Äôre in steady hands. Proudly building for your friends and family. Over the past 30 years, we‚Äôve built thousands of homes for WA families, with a great many of our valued clients referred to us by their friends and family; it‚Äôs the greatest compliment we can receive as a builder. We‚Äôre proud to build quality homes that stand the test of time, giving you a beautiful home for generations to come, and the peace of mind to refer your loved ones to a home builder they can trust with such a significant investment. New York Dumbo Explore Cities Time Out Markets Subscribe Search Time Out Market New York Food & Drink What's On Find Us Who We Are Order Now Events & Groups Brooklyn (NYC) Barcelona Boston Chicago Lisboa Montr√©al Porto Dubai Bahrain Cape Town Osaka Budapest Union Square (NYC) New York Dumbo Explore Cities Time Out Markets Close Explore Cities Time Out Markets Markets Brooklyn (NYC) Barcelona Boston Chicago Lisboa Montr√©al Porto Dubai Bahrain Cape Town Osaka Budapest Union Square (NYC) Food & Drink What's On Find Us Who We Are Order Now Events & Groups Popular cities London New York Paris Chicago Los Angeles Lisboa Hong Kong Sydney Melbourne Porto Singapore Barcelona Madrid Montr√©al Boston Miami Worldwide Subscribe English English instagram facebook tiktok Photograph: Filip Wolap Photograph: Filip Wolap Who We Are - Time Out Market New York What is Time Out Market? Tuesday November 26 2024 What is Time Out Market? What happens when a slick media company endeavors to bring together the best of the city under one roof? You get Time Out Market, a dining-and-culture experience curated and vetted by our editors. It‚Äôs a concept our Time Out Portugal team created in 2014, then launched inside the city‚Äôs historic market, Mercado da Ribeira. With eight bars, a dozen shops, a high-end music venue and 24 restaurants‚Äîfrom the best burger spot and the top steak joint to the tastiest sushi sensation‚ÄîLisbon‚Äôs finest eateries are all represented. This unique mix of traditional and trendy is something you‚Äôll find only at Time Out Market Lisbon. Across the Atlantic, Time Out Market New York picks up the baton and introduces Gotham to its own version of this tried-and-true concept right in the heart of Dumbo. Spread across 24,000-square-feet, the curated dining destination packs multiple eateries, three bars, a fifth-floor rooftop and art installations into one space that encompasses the best food, drinks and culture that New York has to offer. As in its predecessors, the New York outpost follows a simple rule when it comes to curation: If it‚Äôs great, it goes on the site; if it‚Äôs unmissable, it goes in the Market. A meal at Time Out Market New York means you‚Äôre truly digging into NYC‚Äôs most delicious dishes, cooked by the most exciting talents in the city. What you‚Äôll find inside is a hand-selected array of everything you could want to eat, drink and see in the greatest city in the world, all under one roof. New York‚Äôs destination for eating and drinking, featuring the city‚Äôs top chefs, most-talked-about restaurants and the buzziest bars‚Äîplus the latest in arts and culture all huddled together under one roof. HOW WE DO IT Address Time Out Market New York, Empire Stores, 55 Water Street, Brooklyn, NY 11201 Opening hours Monday: 8am ‚Äì 10pm Tuesday: 8am ‚Äì 10pm Wednesday: 8am ‚Äì 10pm Thursday: 8am ‚Äì 10pm Friday: 8am ‚Äì 11pm Saturday: 8am ‚Äì 11pm Sunday: 8am ‚Äì 10pm * Ess-a-Bagel is open every day from 8am‚Äì4pm. * Clinton St. Baking Company is open for coffee and brunch Monday through Friday from 9am to 3pm and Saturday and Sunday from 8am to 4pm. Drink. Play Where Sports, Craft Beer, and Good Vibes Meet in Downtown San Diego - Time Out Sports Tavern Food Menu Drink Menu Book an Event Daily Specials See Our Taps Who we are Craft beer. High-quality bar food. Sports. Step into Time Out Sports Tavern for a top-notch sports bar experience in downtown San Diego. Our local bar boasts a rotating selection of 29 taps, featuring the best craft beers in the city . Relax in our laid-back atmosphere while enjoying high-quality bar food , like juicy burgers, spicy wings, and tacos made with fresh in-house tortillas. With over 100 bottles of liquor, flavored seltzers, wine, and a collection of rare whiskies and bourbons, there‚Äôs something for everyone. Catch all the major sports, UFC and boxing fights on our many TV screens, including a big screen, and enjoy a game of pool and arcade games. Whether you‚Äôre after a quick drink after work, a night out with friends, or a place to watch the game, Time Out Sports Tavern is your ultimate destination for sports, food, drinks, and fun. Years Locally Owned & Operated 0 + Years Locally Owned & Operated 0 + The Best Rotating Craft Beer Selection in San Diego Face it, you‚Äôre sick of going to San Diego bars that only have the most basic craft beers. We‚Äôre here to change that. Our huge variety of 29 rotating taps, in addition to our selection of cans and bottles are some of the best, high quality, and most unique beers in the entire county. There‚Äôs a beer here for everyone. If you hate beer, we have wine, seltzer, 100+ bottles of liquor, and soft drinks for people like you‚Ä¶ View Beer Menu Happy Hour is on Us. 3 PM - 6:30 PM Whether you‚Äôre looking to unwind after a long day or simply want to celebrate with friends, our Downtown San Diego Happy Hour offers the best happy hour deals in San Diego , perfect for elevating your spirits. Unwind and cheer on your favorite teams while enjoying fantastic deals on drinks and appetizers. See More Hungry? High-Quality Bar Food. Get ready for a laid-back, yet elevated bar experience at our joint. We‚Äôre serving up killer twists on classic bar fare using the freshest ingredients in town. Think juicy burgers, tacos made with house-made tortillas that‚Äôll knock your socks off, and wings with a signature flair. We‚Äôre all about supporting our local community by choosing local vendors, bakers, pretzel makers, and more when we can, and keeping things fresh, because that‚Äôs how we roll. Sunday Special Come back soon for more info! Monday Special Any Sandwich + Fries + Beer of the Day $23.50 Tuesday Special California Burrito + Beer of the Day or Pacifico $21.85 2 Tacos & a Tequila Shot $21.85 (Carne Asada, Chicken, or Potato) Add Chips to either of the above specials +$5 Wednesday Special Tenders + Fries + Beer of the Day $22.75 Thursday Special 2 Burgers + Fries + 2 Beers of the Day $45 Friday Special Select Craft Beers for $7 Frequently Ask Questions How Long have you been in business? Established in 2010, our bar and grill has been a staple in the community, providing a welcoming atmosphere for locals to gather and enjoy quality drinks and food. With a focus on serving refreshing beverages, including a wide selection of beer, and delicious eats, we've been dedicated to ensuring every visit is a memorable one. We're proud to be a part of our community and look forward to continuing to be a go-to destination for good times and great food. CAN I HAVE AN EVENT HERE? Bringing a group together for a good time? We offer options for large table reservations and full or partial bar buyouts. Our pricing and availability vary based on the day and time of your desired reservation. Contact us to inquire about our current availability and to make arrangements for your event. Do you cater? From birthday bashes to wedding after parties, gallery events to apartment and office socials, we've got your catering needs covered. Whether you're after our classic bar bites like wings and tacos, or looking for something extra special for a big event, we've got you. Our elevated catering options feature fan favorites like shrimp cocktail, fresh kale salads, sizzling chicken skewers, and charcuterie boards that'll have your guests talking. And, whether you want us to serve on site or just drop and go, we've got the flexibility to make it happen Do you have vegetarian options? Tired of the same old veggie options? Have no fear, vegetarians. From our famous Impossible burgers and loaded veggie burritos, to our beloved Yuda's Famous Hummus Plate and indulgent potato tacos, there's no shortage of delicious options. And don't worry, we've still got your classic fries and salads, but why settle when you can dig into some seriously drool-worthy dishes? ARE CHILDREN ALLOWED? Family, friends, and good times - that's what Time Out is all about. Kids are welcome to join in on the fun until 10pm, and there's no shortage of things to do - from arcade games to digging into our delectable menu. Of course, only if you're 21 or over, can you raise a glass to the good times. And for our little guests, we've got bar height high chairs so everyone can feel right at home. So come on in and let's make some memories that will last a lifetime. DO YOU HAVE ALL OF THE SPORTS ON TV? At our place, sports are a big deal. Whether it's college or pro games, we've got all the major packages covered. UFC and boxing fans, don't worry we've got you, too!  Keep an eye on our social media or give us a shout to stay up to date on what's playing. And if you're a fan of the more unconventional competitions, like unicorn racing or llama hurdles, just give us a ring. With all the channels we have, we can try our best to find your game and put it on for you and your squad to enjoy. About ‚Äì Time Out for Business | United States Skip to content Get In Touch About Audience By Product Digital Social By Location New York New York Kids Chicago Los Angeles San Francisco Miami Products Digital Live Time Out Markets Local Marketing Solutions Affiliates Creative Solutions Press Get In Touch About About Time Out Time Out is the #1 brand for inspiring and enabling people to enjoy and explore the best of the city Who we are Time Out is a trusted global brand with a distinctly local voice. Our global network of expert editors and writers curate the best things to do and the coolest places to go, from Athens to Yogyakarta. Locals and visitors trust us to cut through and help them discover incredible things to eat, drink, see and do. We know because we go! Time Out is your best friend in the city. We help you have fun, and our cheeky tone, unrestricted judgment, cool aesthetic, and independent attitude make us experts without being boring. Our international audience trusts Time Out for inspiration, information and insider insight ‚Äî with an irreverent Time Out twist! What we do Time Out regularly lets its audience in on everything that‚Äôs good, vital, and exciting in our cities. We‚Äôre the trusted arbiters of city lifestyle across the country and around the world, and we‚Äôre known for telling people what to do and where to do it. If it isn‚Äôt worth knowing about, we don‚Äôt write about it. We provide market leading products that inspire and enable our readers to get out and explore the best of their cities. We deliver relevant, authentic, and useful content and experiences to a discerning audience ‚Äì wherever, whenever, and in whatever format our readers choose. A global network Time Out Group is a global media and hospitality business that helps people explore and experience the best of the city through its two divisions ‚Äì Time Out Media and Time Out Market . Time Out launched in London in 1968 with a magazine; today, the Group‚Äôs digital and physical presence comprises websites, mobile, social, video, live events and Time Out Market. Across these platforms, Time Out distributes its curated content ‚Äì written by professional journalists ‚Äì around the best food, drink, culture, entertainment and travel across 333 cities in 59 countries. Time Out Market is a food and cultural market leveraging the Time Out brand to bring the best of the city together under one roof: its best chefs, drinks and cultural experiences‚Äìbased on the editorial curation Time Out has always been known for.¬† The first Time Out Market opened in Lisbon in 2014 and is now Portugal‚Äôs most popular attraction with over 4.1 million visitors in 2019.¬† Following this success, new Time Out Markets opened in¬† New York, Boston, Montreal, Chicago, and in Dubai.¬†¬† A further pipeline of other global locations includes Porto, Cape Town, Barcelona, Vancouver, Abu Dhabi , Prague and more. Time Out and its global staff have won and been nominated for a number of highly prestigious awards and accolades around the world over the years‚Äîread all about it here . Time Out Youth is a place where LGBTQ+ youth ages 13-24 can experience a sense of belonging and community. More About Us Our Mission & Vision Our Mission is to support LGBTQ+ youth by offering vital programs, fostering unconditional acceptance, and creating safe spaces for self-expression through leadership, community support and advocacy. Our Vision is to inspire inclusive communities where all youth are equally empowered to reach their true potential. More About Time Out Youth Opportunities for Youth Programs Our programs connect youth with each other and provide a space to be your authentic self. Programs Services We provide free counseling, housing support, and gender affirming case management to LGBTQ+ youth. Services Events View our monthly calendar to stay up to date on all upcoming events News & Events Visit Us in Person Inside Time Out Youth Get To Know Our Center See All Youth Activities Community Engagement & Resources Time Out Youth provides support and resources to students, educators, and other youth-serving staff such as trainings & workshops, policy & procedure consultations, GSA support, and student leadership development. Available for all youth in our age range. Wed 10 10 September @ 5:30 PM - 6:30 PM DBT Group Time Out Youth                                                                                                                                                                                                                3800 Monroe Rd Time Out Youth‚Äôs DBT Skills Group for LGBTQ+ youth ages 13‚Äì24 is a free, open group that runs in 12‚Äì14 week cycles. This group is mostly about learning helpful tools (psychoeducation) while also practicing DBT skills to manage emotions, cope with stress, build healthier relationships, and stay present. It‚Äôs a welcoming space for anyone who feels overwhelmed, deals with mood swings or self-criticism, or just wants new ways to feel more in control and connected. Dinner will be provided for every meeting. Wed 10 10 September @ 6:00 PM - 7:30 PM Space Aces - On Discord Space Aces meets two Wednesdays a month on Discord for self-identified asexual, aromantic and other ace/aro identified youth. This discussion group explores complex and practical topics related to their orientation and their lived experiences!
